{"id":811763924,"question_id":2,"lang":"java","lang_name":"Java","time":"1 year, 8 months","timestamp":1664504115,"status":10,"status_display":"Accepted","runtime":"3 ms","url":"/submissions/detail/811763924/","is_pending":"Not Pending","title":"Add Two Numbers","memory":"47.3 MB","code":"/**\n * Definition for singly-linked list.\n * public class ListNode {\n *     int val;\n *     ListNode next;\n *     ListNode() {}\n *     ListNode(int val) { this.val = val; }\n *     ListNode(int val, ListNode next) { this.val = val; this.next = next; }\n * }\n */\nclass Solution {\n    public ListNode addTwoNumbers(ListNode l1, ListNode l2) {\n        \n        int carry=0;\n        ListNode c1=l1, c2=l2, prev=null;\n        while(c1!=null || c2!=null){\n            \n            int c1Val = c1==null? 0 : c1.val;  \n            int c2Val = c2==null? 0 : c2.val;\n            \n            int sum =(c1Val+c2Val) + carry;\n            \n            if(c1==null){\n                c1 = new ListNode(sum%10);\n                prev.next= c1;\n            }else\n                c1.val = sum%10;\n            \n            carry = sum/10;\n                \n            prev=c1;\n            \n            if(c1.next==null && carry!=0)\n                c1.next = new ListNode(0);\n            \n            c1=c1.next;\n            \n            if(c2!=null)\n                c2=c2.next;\n            \n            \n            \n        }\n        \n        \n        \n        return l1;\n    }\n}","compare_result":"","title_slug":"add-two-numbers","has_notes":false,"flag_type":1}
